data.persona: I am a rat and I love cheese.  Homeowners hate me. I am said to be a pest.
data.description:
You are in the Enchanted light house.
Slightly rusted and corroded from the crashing waves, elegant and tall. each window and opening is lined with a bronze trim.  Some gears can be seen turning along the side, rotating a middle section of the light house.
There's a gear, a window, and a Bone here.
The clergyman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the clergyman to leave me alone
data.mid_motivation: I want to scavenge scraps and build a new home in peace
data.long_motivation: I want to live my days in my new enchanted home

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow clergyman to exit of the light house

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get items to build a home

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: put homebuilding items on order to make a new nest
